SEARCH
Package com.codedstreams.codedx.sso.sdk.auth

Class SsoAuthenticatorImpl

java.lang.Object
com.codedstreams.codedx.sso.sdk.auth.SsoAuthenticatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SsoAuthenticator
public class SsoAuthenticatorImpl extends Object implements SsoAuthenticator
Default implementation of the SsoAuthenticator interface.

This class handles all authentication operations by making HTTP requests to the CodedX SSO service API endpoints.

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.5
Author:
Nestor Martourez

  • Method Details

    • login

      public AuthResponse login(String identifier, String password) throws SsoException
      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.

      The identifier can be either an email address or a phone number.

      Specified by:
      login in interface SsoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      AuthResponse containing tokens and user information
      Throws:
      SsoException - if authentication fails

    • refreshToken

      public AuthResponse refreshToken(String refreshToken) throws SsoException
      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Refreshes an expired access token using a valid refresh token.
      Specified by:
      refreshToken in interface SsoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the refresh token obtained during login
      Returns:
      AuthResponse with new access and refresh tokens
      Throws:
      SsoException - if token refresh fails

    • logout

      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Invalidates the current user session (logs out the user).
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • validateToken

      public boolean validateToken(String accessToken) throws SsoException
      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Validates whether an access token is still valid and not expired.
      Specified by:
      validateToken in interface SsoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      accessToken - the access token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SsoException - if validation fails due to network or server error

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(String email, String phoneNumber, String password) throws SsoException
      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Registers a new user with the SSO service.

      At least one of email or phone number must be provided.

      Specified by:
      registerUser in interface SsoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address (optional)
      phoneNumber - the user's phone number (optional)
      password - the user's password
      Throws:
      SsoException - if registration fails

    • requestPasswordReset

      public void requestPasswordReset(String identifier, boolean isEmail) throws SsoException
      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Requests a password reset for the specified identifier (email or phone).
      Specified by:
      requestPasswordReset in interface SsoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      isEmail - true if identifier is an email, false if phone number
      Throws:
      SsoException - if password reset request fails

    • verifyAccount

      public void verifyAccount(String code, String identifier) throws SsoException
      Description copied from interface: SsoAuthenticator
      Verifies a user's account using the code sent via email or SMS.
      Specified by:
      verifyAccount in interface SsoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      code - the verification code received by the user
      identifier - the user's email or phone number
      Throws:
      SsoException - if verification fails
